Text: Please support me and support you by seeding! If you don't seed it would be your lost. I can't upload other new torrents because I need to seed with the old ones because of you. Let's share! Thank you!

Sometimes I think: why should I waste my time uploading rare torrents if you don't bother to seed a while after downloadind? You're so selfish! Not all, but most of you. I will thank always to the seeders. Thank you bros! And to the leechers only: go f... yourself!
Because of lack of good seeders and full of filthy selfish leechers I will seed no more. Why I should? For whom? I'm very disapointed of you all that have downloaded this. Bleah!
